thread.title: Will Trump’s Name-Calling Work in Legislative Arena Like It Did in Campaign? - Washington Wire - WSJ
thread.title_full: Will Trump’s Name-Calling Work in Legislative Arena Like It Did in Campaign? - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Aaron Zitner
title: Will Trump’s Name-Calling Work in Legislative Arena Like It Did in Campaign? - Washington Wire - WSJ
text:
Three days into the new session of Congress, the effort to rework the nation’s health insurance system has turned to name-calling and sloganeering. President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday morning took to to criticize Democrats for refusing to abandon their signature health care law or to work with Republicans on a replacement. In the course of […]
